message.body: Hey ho! Safe and sound from Boston? How was it?
It was good. His friends were nice. But the flight was a bit scary. I apparently have a really hard time popping my ears. It was so painful!
Yeah. I get some static in my right ear but that was it. I still felt the pain.
Aw! So sorry. But least it was fun!!!
Aw! So sorry. But least it was fun!!!
Yeah. Although there was a shooting threat on campus so we had to go elsewhere on Saturday. But nothing came of the threat.
